channel.title: CVE Feed for SmartStar Software -- CWS Web-Base
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SmartStar Software -- CWS Web-Base

item.title: CVE-2023-48375|2023-12-15T07:46:16.462Z -- smartstar%20software -- cws%20web-base
item.description: SmartStar Software CWS is a web-based integration platform, it has a vulnerability of missing authorization and users are able to access data or perform actions that they should not be allowed to perform via commands. An authenticated with normal user privilege can execute administrator privilege, resulting in performing arbitrary system operations or disrupting service.
